Arm I : Patients undergo low-energy laser therapy visible red light ( 650 nm ) daily 15-20 minute begin first day transplant condition regimen continue day 2 bone marrow transplantation . Arm II : Patients undergo low-energy laser therapy invisible infra-red light ( 780 nm ) daily schedule arm I . Arm III : Patients undergo sham laser therapy daily schedule arm I . Patients follow day 3 , 7 , 10 , 14 , 18 , 21 , 24 . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 66 patient ( 22 per treatment arm ) accrue study .
